enchantment.astralenchant.execution.desc: Attacks with this item will have their damage type converted to "generic.kill".
enchantment.astralenchant.last_stand.des: Consume experience points to avoid death.
enchantment.astralenchant.item_protectio: Protects the item's components. Note: Durability is not protected.
enchantment.astralenchant.essence_of_enc: All stats of the item increase based on the total level of all other enchantments besides this one.
